ctx: intros A l0 l1 H1 x l2 l3 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce is_permutation to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros A l0 l1 H1 x l2 l3 H2 H3.
intros A l0 l1 H1 x l2 l3 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set l0, l1 : list A H1 : is_permutation A l0 l1 x : A l2, l3 : list A H2 : insertion A x l0 l2 H3 : insertion A x l1 l3 The term "l0" has type "list A" while it is expected to have type "forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> ?P l l' -> forall (x0 : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x0 l' l'' -> ?P (x0 :: l) l''".

ctx: intros A l0 l1 H1 x l2 l3 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set l0, l1 : list A H1 : is_permutation A l0 l1 x : A l2, l3 : list A H2 : insertion A x l0 l2 H3 : insertion A x l1 l3 Unable to unify "l3" with "l2".

ctx: intros A l0 l1 H1 x l2 l3 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: intros l l' H4 H5 y l4 H6.

original: intros A l0 l1 H1 x l2 l3 H2 H3. unfold is_permutation. intros a. apply (is_permutation_sind A _ _ l0 l1 H1). + apply (is_permutation_refl A _). + intros l l' H4 H5 y l4 H6. destruct (insertion_trans A _ _ _ H5 _ H6) as [l5 [H7 H8]]. apply (cons_is_permutation A l l' H4). apply (insertion_is_permutation A _ l5 a H8).
